messageBody:
Seems like an excellent opportunity for an interceptor. It would look very
annotation-ish in use.

@Interceptor
public StatementInterceptor spawner= new BigTest(800);

Regards,

Kent

_____

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of Mark
Thornton
Sent: Tuesday, June 09, 2009 11:01 AM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [junit] Heap size





I have some tests that require relatively large heap sizes to complete
(eg 800MB). It would be useful to have an annotation to express this so
that a runner could either fail early or fork a JVM with a suitable heap.

Regards
Mark Thornton
